name: Camel (Shoemaker's Last Software)
description:
Shoemaker's Last proudly presents:  Camel!

Written exclusively for the Tandy/TRS-80 Color Computer, this is the classic game Camel, originally a Creative Computing type-in BASIC program.  Game play is faithful to the original, but this version includes 4-color hi-res graphics and is written in 100% machine language.  This game will run on a CoCo 1, 2 or 3.  

After downloading from the link below, insert or mount the disk and type LOADM"CAMEL" followed by EXEC to start your perilous desert journey!

On a CoCo 3 only,  after the title music plays, you may press the [P] key on your keyboard while on the title screen to cycle through multiple color options for RGB and composite monitors.
